summary: Employee Tickets (Beta) feature validation completed successfully. All CRUD operations confirmed: Create via dedicated form page, Read via ticket detail dialog (click Ticket ID), Update via Edit in three-dot menu, Delete via Delete in three-dot menu. Three Bayzat Employee Ticket workflows found (triggers: ticket created, ticket status updated; actions: send email, create pay adjustment). Approval flows configured for 40+ ticket types with advanced conditional routing and default flows. Feature includes search, 8 filter types, sortable columns, bulk selection, View reports, and Download functionality. Pending tab shows inline Approve/Reject for assigned approvers. Detail dialog shows full ticket info, calculation details (for leave encashment type), and activity/comment timeline.
